metadata.title: CVE-2020-21602 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
libde265 v1.0.4 contains a heap buffer overflow in theput_weighted_bipred_16_fallback function, which can be exploited via acrafted a file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21602` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.4-1ubuntu0.1
libde265-examples - 1.0.4-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libde265 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.4-1ubuntu0.1').
